ComicInfo.Title: Things We've Often Wondered About; E.T.'s Report My Experiences on Earth; It's a Sure Bet That...; Rocky's Scrapbook; The Princess and the Frog; Retaliations to Dating Cliches; True Facts They Never Teach You in School; You Know You're Going Too Far When...; How Popular Are You?; Solutions to Everyday Frustrations; Heart to Heart
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.
